Subject: Need help in SIEM integration - Qradar
Description:
Hi Team,

I need to integrate my EPP DLP solution to SIEM (IBM Qradar). So how we can take the logs from the server and push it to the log collector server, Could you please help me in this activity ?

Thanks
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer confirmed that we can close this ticket for now.
During the session we had we demonstrated that the SIEM logs are being sent from our EPP server to their SIEM and its their configuration than needs to be reconfigured.
